name: Ban and unban user in community @android @medium-risk @2-devices
description:
Verifies that a community admin can ban a user. 
    Banned user cannot send messages anymore.
    Admin then can unban a user and they can send messages again.
descriptionHtml:
Verifies that a community admin can ban a user.
Banned user cannot send messages anymore.
Admin then can unban a user and they can send messages again.

steps.name: Restore admin account, create new account to be banned
Bob sends a message to community
Verify Bob cannot send messages in community
Admin unbans Bob, Bob can send a third message
